description:
Canonical artifact interface.
Defined in schemas/draft/artifact.schema.json

artifact_type.description: Type of artifact (file, diff, patch, action, message, etc). Free-form and engine-defined.

action.description: Operation to perform with this artifact (create, update, delete, apply, execute, etc). Free-form and engine-defined.

target.description: Path, resource, or identifier this artifact applies to. Optional.

body.description:
Inline content for small artifacts.
Can be string, object, array, or null.

body_file.description: Indicates an external data file within the artifact directory.
